makerow_pca10 <- function (i) {
  str_glue("{round_(pca10$loadings[i,1])} & {round_(pca10$loadings[i,2])} & {round_(pca10$loadings[i,5])} & {round_(pca10$loadings[i,4])} & {round_(pca10$loadings[i,3])}")
}
